sentences.en: A car sped past in a cloud of dust .
sentences.cn: 一辆汽车疾驰而过，扬起一片尘土。

sentences.en: a marketing strategy that left our competitors in the dust.
sentences.cn: 把我们的竞争对手远远地抛在后面的市场策略

sentences.en: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.
sentences.cn: 突然刮起一阵微风吹得灰尘飞扬。

sentences.en: a thick layer of dust
sentences.cn: 厚厚的一层灰尘

sentences.en: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.cn: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.en: All the furniture was covered in dust.
sentences.cn: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.en: Billy leaned forward and brushed a speck of dust off his shoes.
sentences.cn: 比利俯身擦掉了鞋子上的一丝灰尘。

sentences.en: Dust and blend blusher on the apples of your cheeks.
sentences.cn: 将胭脂调匀涂在你脸颊红润的地方。

sentences.en: Dust is everywhere.
sentences.cn: 到处都是灰尘。

sentences.en: Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.en: dusted off last year's winter coat.
sentences.cn: 重又穿上去年的冬衣

sentences.en: He's now facing suspension after a dust-up with the referee.
sentences.cn: 在与裁判发生争执后他现在面临着停赛。

sentences.en: I vacuumed and dusted and polished the living room.
sentences.cn: 我把起居室吸了尘、掸了灰并且擦亮了。

sentences.en: I was dusting in the bedroom when the phone rang.
sentences.cn: 我正在卧室里打扫，电话铃响了。

sentences.en: It was hard to see the colours under the layer of dust.
sentences.cn: 蒙了一层灰尘后颜色就很难看清了。

sentences.en: Lights reflected off dust-covered walls creating a ghostly luminescence.
sentences.cn: 灯光照在满是灰尘的墙上，反射回苍白的冷光。

sentences.en: Many of the machines are gathering dust in basements.
sentences.cn: 许多机器尘封在地下室里。

sentences.en: Occasionally scree fell in a shower of dust and noise.
sentences.cn: 偶尔会有碎石滚下，扬起大团尘土，噼啪作响。

sentences.en: Once the dust had settled Beck defended his decision.
sentences.cn: 事态一旦平息，贝克就为他的决定辩白。

sentences.en: Rachel dusted the books and the bookshelves.
sentences.cn: 雷切尔给书和书架除尘。

sentences.en: she hoped that the dust would settle quickly and the episode be forgotten.
sentences.cn: 她希望这场混乱快些结束，这一段故事就此被忘却。

sentences.en: some professors let their computers gather dust.
sentences.cn: 一些教授搁着他们的电脑不用，任其落满灰尘。

sentences.en: Tanks raise huge trails of dust when they move.
sentences.cn: 坦克开动时扬起大量尘土。

sentences.en: The allegation has caused one lecturer's career to bite the dust.
sentences.cn: 这项指控断送了一名讲师的前程。

sentences.en: The dust and untidiness in her room no longer bothered her.
sentences.cn: 屋里的尘土和凌乱已不再令她烦心。

sentences.en: The hens darted away on all sides, raising a cloud of dust.
sentences.cn: 一群母鸡四处乱窜，搅起一团尘土。

sentences.en: the party would be dust and ashes if he couldn't come.
sentences.cn: 如果他不来，这个聚会会令人大失所望的。

sentences.en: The powdery dust rose in a cloud around him.
sentences.cn: 一团粉尘在他周围扬起。

sentences.en: The wind was blowing dust and leaves up from the ground.
sentences.cn: 风吹起了地上的尘土和树叶。

sentences.en: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 厨房里一尘不染。

sentences.en: today's modems leave their predecessors in the dust.
sentences.cn: 现在的调制解调器要远远胜于以前的。

sentences.en: well, that's part one done and dusted.
sentences.cn: 这就是已经完成的第一部分。

sentences.en: Wind caught the sudden puff of dust and blew it inland.
sentences.cn: 风猛地刮起一阵灰尘，将它吹往内陆。

words.tran_cn: 抹布，掸子；除尘器；打扫灰尘的人

phrases.tran_cn: 防尘；尘埃控制；飞尘捕集
粉尘排放，烟尘排放；[机]扬尘量
(北美，非正式)远远落在某人的后面，望尘莫及
n. 烟灰；烟道灰；炉顶灰
落后：落后，如在赛跑或竞争中落后于人

phrases.phrase: kick up a dust (或 美
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)吵闹，引起骚乱，惹是生非
轻松胜过，远远胜于，比…强得多
干得起劲：以极大的精力和速度做某项任务
混乱结束，骚乱平息，纷扰平静下来

trans.tran_en: dry powder consisting of extremely small bits of dirt that is in buildings on furniture, floors etc if they are not kept clean
to clean the dust from a surface by moving something such as a soft cloth across it
